PISTOL.strategy: **Standard Setup**: 2 players A (quad/default), 1 player outside, 2 players B (ramp/site). Outside player calls rotations, A players hold crossfires.
**Aggressive Outside**: 3 players outside (yard control), 1 player A, 1 player B. Outside players push for picks, A/B hold retake positions.
**Stack A Upper**: 3 players A upper (quad, default, close), 2 players outside/B. Focus on A retakes, outside players rotate fast.
**Ramp Control**: 2 players A, 2 players B (heavy ramp), 1 player outside. Ramp players hold aggressively, deny B upper access.
**Anti-Rush A**: 3 players A (close angles), 1 player outside, 1 player B. A players play crossfires against ramp rushes.
**Lower Stack**: 2 players A, 1 player outside, 2 players lower/B. Lower players hold tunnels aggressively, force upper plays.
**Hut Control**: 2 players A, 2 players outside (hut focus), 1 player B. Outside players deny hut access with utility.
**Rotational**: 1 player A, 2 players outside, 2 players B. Mobile defense, fast rotates based on contact.
**Secret Hold**: 2 players A, 1 player outside, 2 players B (1 secret). Secret player denies flanks, B player holds site.
**Info Play**: 2 players A, 1 player outside, 2 players B. Conservative angles, play for information and retakes.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A Close**: 4 players A upper (close angles), 1 player B. Upgraded pistols, play for close trades. B player saves.
**Aggressive Outside**: 3 players outside with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Outside players push yard, savers hold retakes.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A (save), 4 players B/lower. Upgraded pistols B, overwhelm one area.
**Ramp Push**: 2 players A, 3 players B (ramp push). B players armor+pistol, aggressive early round contact.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players A close, 2 players outside/B save. A players upgraded pistols, crossfire setups.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A, 1 outside, 2 B. Passive angles, survival focus.
**Hut Control**: 2 players A, 3 players outside (hut push). Outside players upgraded pistols, deny hut access.
**Lower Push**: 2 players A, 1 player outside, 2 players lower (aggressive). Lower players armor+pistol, tunnel control.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A, 1 player outside, 2 players B. All save, retake utility focus.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A (1 upgraded), 2 players outside (1 upgraded), 1 player B save. Selective upgrades.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Outside**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players outside (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long angles.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player outside (rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Strong A hold.
**Outside Control**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players outside (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Outside rifles control yard.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players outside (1 rifle), 1 player B (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Ramp Rifle**: 2 players A (SMGs), 2 players B (1 rifle ramp), 1 player outside (rifle). Ramp rifle denies access.
**Balanced**: 2 players A (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players outside (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A (SMGs), 1 player outside (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Hut Rifle**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 2 players outside (1 rifle hut), 1 player B (SMG). Hut rifle controls access.
**Aggressive Outside**: 2 players A (SMGs), 3 players outside (2 rifles push). Outside rifles take map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A (1 rifle), 1 player outside (rifle), 2 players B (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Retake focus.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player outside (AWP), 2 players B (rifles). AWP yard, rifles hold sites.
**A Heavy**: 3 players A (rifles + utility), 1 player outside (rifle), 1 player B (rifle). Strong A defense.
**Outside Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 3 players outside (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy outside presence.
**Hut Deny**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players outside (rifles + utility), 1 player B (rifle). Smoke hut, deny access.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players outside (rifles), 1 player B (rifle + utility). Split defense focus.
**AWP Quad**: 2 players A (1 AWP quad, 1 rifle), 2 players outside (rifles), 1 player B (rifle). AWP holds quad.
**Ramp Control**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player outside (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Heavy ramp utility.
**B Stack**: 1 player A (rifle), 2 players outside (rifles), 2 players B (rifles). Force A plays, fast rotates.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A (rifles), 1 player outside (rifle), 2 players B (rifles + utility). Retake coordination.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A (rifles), 2 players outside (rifles push), 1 player B (rifle). Outside map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **A Ramp Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A through ramp with coordinated pop-flashes. First two players clear quad, last three secure site.
**B Rush Lower**: 4 players rush B through lower tunnels with armor. 1 player goes ramp for late rotate. Lower players use pop-flashes.
**Outside Control**: 3 players outside with utility, 2 players ramp. Outside players smoke toxic waste, take yard control.
**Split A**: 2 players ramp, 3 players outside to upper via hut. Ramp players smoke quad, outside players coordinate timing.
**Lower Default**: 2 players ramp, 2 players lower, 1 player outside. Play for picks and information.
**Hut Focus**: 4 players outside focusing on hut area, 1 player ramp. Outside players smoke toxic, take hut control.
**B Fake to A**: 2 players make noise lower tunnels, 3 players position outside. Execute A through hut after rotations.
**Ramp Heavy**: 4 players ramp with pop-flashes, 1 player outside for info. Ramp players smoke quad, coordinate peek.
**Anti-Stack**: 3 players outside, 2 players ramp. Outside players smoke multiple angles, take yard control.
**Secret Play**: 2 players ramp, 2 players lower (1 goes secret), 1 player outside. Secret player flanks on contact.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven B Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush B through lower tunnels with pop-flashes.
**Stack A Upper**: All 5 players stack A site upper level. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Outside Lurk**: 1 player lurks outside with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy lower. Outside waits for rotations.
**Deagle Setup**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor, 3 players support with utility. Deagles take long angles.
**Lower Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols, take lower control. 1 player saves in spawn.
**Hut Rush**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven, rush hut from outside. 2 players save completely.
**Ramp Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols ramp, 3 players save lower. Ramp players smoke quad.
**Split Save**: 2 players force buy outside, 2 players force buy ramp, 1 player saves lower.
**Anti-Force**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven outside, 2 players save. Force players smoke toxic.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 players outside, 2 players ramp, 1 player lower.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles ramp, 1 rifle outside, SMGs support.
**Outside Presence**: 2 rifles outside, 2 SMGs ramp, 1 rifle lower. Outside rifles smoke toxic, take yard.
**B Lower Take**: 2 rifles lower, 2 SMGs ramp, 1 rifle outside. Lower rifles clear tunnels, take B control.
**Hut Control**: 3 players outside (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs ramp. Outside players smoke toxic, take hut.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles across map for picks. 1 rifle outside, 1 rifle ramp, 1 rifle lower, 2 SMGs floating.
**Ramp Focus**: 4 players ramp (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle outside. Ramp players smoke quad, take A control.
**Lower Split**: 2 rifles lower, 2 SMGs outside to upper, 1 rifle ramp. Execute B split with timing.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Secret Focus**: 2 rifles ramp, 2 SMGs lower (1 secret), 1 rifle outside. Secret SMG flanks on contact.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles take key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Split Execute**: Smoke quad + default, 2 players ramp, 3 players outside to upper. Flash over smokes.
**Outside Control**: 3 players outside with full utility, 2 players ramp. Outside players smoke toxic + squeaky.
**B Lower Execute**: 3 players lower with smokes/flashes, 2 players ramp. Lower players smoke tunnels, execute B.
**Ramp Heavy**: 4 players ramp with full utility, 1 player outside lurk. Ramp players smoke quad + default.
**Hut Take**: 4 players outside, 1 player ramp. Outside players smoke toxic + squeaky, take hut control.
**Default Setup**: 2 outside, 2 ramp, 1 lower. AWPer outside, riflers ramp. Play for picks with utility.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise ramp with utility, 2 players position lower. Execute B after rotations.
**Secret Execute**: 2 players ramp, 2 players lower, 1 player secret. Secret player flanks B site on contact.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on ramp, 4 players execute A site. 1 player lower watches rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through lower. Use utility for timing.
